text: Monster House is a 2006 computer-animated movie. It is directed by Gil Kenan, written by Dan Harmon, Rob Schrab and Pamela Pettler, It stars the voices of Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Steve Buscemi, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Kevin James, Nick Cannon, Jason Lee, Fred Willard, Jon Heder, Catherine O'Hara and Kathleen Turner. It was produced by Amblin Entertainment and ImageMovers, and released into theaters on July 21, 2006. == References == Category:2006 computer-animated movies Category:2000s supernatural movies Category:2006 comedy movies Category:2006 horror movies Category:American animated movies Category:American supernatural movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American horror movies Category:Halloween movies Category:2000s monster movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Gil Kenan
title: Monster House (movie)
